website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are shopping for a plush toy for a cat or anime lover, this well-made toy makes a great gift.
pros: Sparks enthusiasm among fans of the Sailor Moon anime series, as Artemis is a beloved cat known for watching over the character Minako
Toy has nice details, sturdy stitching, and a sweet face – even cuter in person
cons: Seems a bit smaller than expected, but this is a minor concern that doesn't affect the quality of the toy

customer_reviews.title: Sailor Venus Approved
customer_reviews.text: For Comic Con this year I was in Cosplay as Sailor Venus and wanted to have a Mini Artemis by my side. This was one of the only Plush Artemis's that weren't at a ridiculous price or had red eyes. This Artemis was perfect!! He was easy to carry around, looked like the original and even better in person than in the picture. Seller was great, package arrived in a fast manner, and I would definitely buy from again! **See my Review on the Sailor Venus Tiara
customer_reviews.author: Dreambo13

customer_reviews.title: A happy sailor scout
customer_reviews.text: I grew up on Sailor Moon and I was so excited to buy Artemis! It came earlier than expected even! I felt like a big kid when opening the package. It's well made and his whiskers were taped down to prevent damage in transit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cinaed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter. She has the Luna cat as well. This is just as great quality. Be careful with the whiskers though as they can come out easily, so if you child wants to play with it a lot, be advised may lose whiskers, but this is definitely worth the purchase. We love Sailor Moon. The eyes and the moon symbol are very well stitched on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good plush, great gift
customer_reviews.text: A great gift for any sailor moon fan, I purchased this as a gift for my best friend. Since she lives far away, I had it delivered gift wrapped, which ended up being a great decision. It got there days before the expected delivery date, and the gift wrapping was really nice. She loved the gift, and would recommend it to anyone who likes the anime/manga. Great deal for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, authentic plush at a good price. Great quality, and perfect as a gift. Not too big, but definitely not too small either, as it is a cat after all. Person who received it as a gift loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Garett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Decent little plushie. Gifted one to my friend and her dog loved it so much he decided to shred Artemis.
customer_reviews.author: Sinead Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better Artemis plushies I've seen out there for sale. Although pretty small (the same size as the Luna plushie), you can still see the care that went into making his smiling face. The stitching is neat, the color is spot on, and of course it's very adorable. Would recommend to any Sailor Moon fan or fan of cute cats!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good for my kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love Artemis and are huge sailor moon fans
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The best part about the Artemis and Luna dolls in this ...
customer_reviews.text: The best part about the Artemis and Luna dolls in this set is that the tails are posed to interlock.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: He is so cute. This plush is a bit smaller than the Diana (his daughter) one. Great for any Sailor moon fan.
customer_reviews.author: Misshollyday

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter flipped over this. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JMcMaken

customer_reviews.title: Artemis looks so cute as a plush!
customer_reviews.text: My delivery was late, but I was okay with it. When I opened it, I couldn't help but awe on how cute he is! His nose is really cute and pink and he's so perfect! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirin

customer_reviews.title: Great attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: I bought this an the matching Luna for Christmas gifts. I was impressed by the quality and attention to detail. The cats are well made, and even stand up on their on. The recipient was very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! They are the coolest and too cute!!! I really appreciate the chance to own these kitties!! They look better in person!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds a little flare
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This little guy arrived in a timely manner and was packaged perfectly. I went to a convention cos-playing as Sailor Venus last year and I have to say, this little guy added a cute flare to my attire. :)
customer_reviews.author: Unique sister

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but very small!
customer_reviews.text: To anyone who wants to make the mistake I made and snatch him up without looking at the measurements on this little guy.... he is quite small! I'm using him as a prop to be Sailor Venus for halloween and he is not life sized.... that being said though he is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge Sailor Moon fan when I was younger, and still am! Gotta say Im stoked that these were actually small plush toys, any bigger and I think theyd be too kiddish, you know? But there small and fit perfect on a shelf for display. damn cute!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only quip was that the plush seemed over-stuffed like the cat has no neck.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are so adorable and cute. Everyone was asking me where I got these from, as a sailor moon fan I am happy with them. Just missing Mercury and Jupiter. I hope I can find them all later on.
customer_reviews.author: Sindel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and very well made. My daughter was so excited to see him in her birthday box!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena S.

customer_reviews.text: This character was my favorite of the moon cats as a child. Hell he still is my favorite. I've been wanting a happy looking plush of him for some time and now have it. He happily sits on my shelf with plushes of other favs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gage

customer_reviews.title: My kid liked it enough
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap but the price is reasonable for the quality. My kid liked it enough
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great item, as described. the stitching looks pretty good on this and the packaging was really good. i would recommend this to any sailor moon fan.
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my SIL she loved it, perfect gift for any Anime lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and they absolutely loved it! The real product looks so much better than the picture. I highly recommend buying this for yourself or a gift for a die hard fan.
customer_reviews.author: Maj

customer_reviews.title: Yeah Artemis!
customer_reviews.text: I truly loved that i had a chance to get this stuff of Artemis, Sailor Moon is one of my favorite anime's and i just couldn't get Luna without Artemis
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: this item is fine. As a toy
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a present for an adult. As a collectible, this item is fine. As a toy..not so much..pretty cheaply made. But it works for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Norbert K Scott

customer_reviews.title: SIlly little irresistable toy
customer_reviews.text: I love my new plushy - it is very soft and cuddly, which is exactly what I was lookinjg for. My dad said it was even a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Warner

customer_reviews.title: really enjoyed carrying luna and artemis around on halloween
customer_reviews.text: really enjoyed carrying luna and artemis around on halloween, (they might have gotten thrown at a couple people) but now they are safe and sound sitting on my bed making it look pretty c:
customer_reviews.author: claire ivers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are about 5 inches tall. Smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: V.T. Reaver

customer_reviews.title: It is very well built and looks just like Artemis from the anime
customer_reviews.text: Gf loves it. It is very well built and looks just like Artemis from the anime.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for SM lover
customer_reviews.text: The toy is perfectly designed for all school SM lovers, or those simply in love with cats. Nice quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS GUILLERMO ARAYA RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, he is so cute & soft. He also matches my Luna plush perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Artemis Plush
customer_reviews.text: The single picture does not do this kitten-sized plush justice. Our Artemis has nicely embroidered features, a cute little body, and an adorable curly tail. Recommended for any Sailor Moon or cat fan!
customer_reviews.author: C. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute. Artemis looks real cute along side my Luna plushie
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Guardao

customer_reviews.title: Artemis plush!
customer_reviews.text: As with the Luna plush, I wish these plushes were just a bit bigger. Still very cute, and I'm grateful that GE is selling any sailor moon merchandise! Made as the same way as the Luna plush, just white, and with no eyelashes, there are no major differences between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He goes great with my Luna! I live him so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it and so did my friend who i got ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and so did my friend who i got for; for christmas :) Will show with you again!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Artemis plushie
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and mega soft. Thank you, I have added him to my collection of Sailormoon fan merchandise :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Artemis plush from Sailor Moon is totally adorable! Goes wonderfully with my Luna Plush. Was an awesome stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: BlaiddDrwg

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very cute but small. It made an excellent,unexpected gift as Sailormoon stuff is rare around here. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Chilson

customer_reviews.title: Win!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps with it every night! Her new favorite toy. She just loves her Sailor Moon toys. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Charles V

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and It looks ok and ill buy more here for shore and all ways
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: very cutee!
customer_reviews.text: super cute! I bought this for anime expo to match my sailor venus cosplay costume. it went really well with it. my dog plays with it now, so its still useful. lol
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany_Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Slightly stiff
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff but my daughter still loves it. Goes great with her Luna.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsie Walker

product_meta.title: Great Eastern Sailormoon Artemis Stuffed 6.5" Plush
product_meta.description:
Your favorite Sailor Moon character is brought to life with these adorable designed plushies! These plush are made with high quality material to ensure a long lasting life. With it's awesome design and soft features, it is sure to excite any anime fan!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Artemis is Minako's white guardian cat, as well as her advisor. He was the one who awoken Minako as Sailor V and has continued to watch over her since then.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
